current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prohibit amounts made available by the Patient
		  Protection and Affordable Care Act and the Health Care and Education
		  Reconciliation Act of 2010 from being transferred to the Internal Revenue
		  Service for implementation of such Acts.
